title: Apple Card reintegrates with Mint budgeting service after rocky launch
content:
Back in 2020, Mint debuted the ability to integrate your Apple Card within your account. After serious issues affecting its use, this feature was temporarily removed. Apple Card users have the opportunity once again to integrate their card usage within the Mint app.

moreâ€¦

The post Apple Card reintegrates with Mint budgeting service after rocky launch appeared first on 9to5Mac.
description: After serious bugs, Apple Card reintegrates with Mint so users can once again manage their card usage within the Mint app.
